content.question: The events depicted in the images relate most directly to which of the following developments in the mid-twentieth century?

choices.label: The nadir, marked by extreme instances of anti-Black public violence
The work of civil rights activists to desegregate public businesses
The ending of the segregation of students based on race following a Supreme Court ruling
The protest of student groups advocating for equal access to voting rights

content.answer: The ending of the segregation of students based on race following a Supreme Court ruling

topic.text: 4.4: Discrimination, Segregation, and the Origins of the Civil Rights Movement

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
